page.title: 07Lunch at Olderfleet
page.content: There are 197 children in our school. At lunch time today,Thursday 9th May 1985,70 pupils took school dinners.The menu was Roast Beef,roast potatoes, peas and gravy followed by Gainsboroagh Tart and custard sauce. 91 took packed lunch.Most people brought their lunch in a plastic box and had drinks in a flask. Sandwiches with ham,egg,onion, chicken,tomato,lettuce,cheese, cucumber,peanut butter and meat spread are popular. Potato crisps,chocolate biscuits, fruit and yoghurts are very common. There are 8 pupils absent so 18 went home for lunch Out of 26 pupils P7 today,16 had a snack to eat during morning break time.
